def insertion_sort(arr):
    f = 0
    while f < len(arr):
        z = i
        while z > 0 and arr[z - 1] > arr[z]:
            temp = arr[z]
            arr[z] = arr[z - 1]
            arr[z - 1] = temp
            z -= 1
        f += 1
    return arr

def insertion_sort(arr):
    f = len(arr)
    while f > 0:
        z = i
        while z < len(arr) and arr[z - 1] > arr[z]:
            temp = arr[z]
            arr[z] = arr[z - 1]
            arr[z - 1] = temp
            z += 1
        f -= 1
    return arr
